name: Hover 2030
description: Hoverboards, evil robots, and cloning! Welcome to the future.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: 2 GHz dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory

reviews.review_text: I tried to play and like this game. But i passed so much stress playing this. The controls are slow, and weird. I can't pass the third level. I can't understand how this works, one time the character jump to backwards but sometimes no, and i don't know how i jump very high sometimes. This game is garbage certainly.
